text:
Weaviate Academy Unit 1: Set Up. 
in this section we'll get you set up with your own instance of ev8 as well as a client Library we'll review different options that exist for deploying leviate and then show you how you can get set up with your own free instance of webiate using vv8 cloud services we'll also show you how to install a V8 client Library through which you can interact with leviate in your preferred language by the time you're done with this section you'll be set up to get really Hands-On by interacting with live waviate instances including running your own queries in the very next section okay see you soon
name: hello_weaviate__set_up
